name: BFSTM Audio Stream
summary: A BFSTM file is an audio file saved in the Binary caFe STreaM (BFSTM) format used by various Nintendo Wii U and Switch games. It may contain a sound effect or background music that is looped during gameplay. BFSTM files replaced .BRSTM and .BCSTM files, which are commonly used by Wii and 3DS games.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
